x_symbol.description: Returns an array of elements whose IDs are (idPrefix + incrementingNum).

par.name: incrementingNum
par.note: Integer. This number is appended to idPrefix to form an element ID, and then incremented for the next iteration.

par.name: fnCallback
par.note: Callback function, iterates thru the list of found elements. Is passed a reference to each Element object found.

par.name: data
par.note: Optional. This is passed to the callback function.

x_symbol.return: An array of Element objects (even if it is an empty array).
